titleStmt.title: The temple A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the fifth of August. 1624. By Tho. Adams.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Mathewes for Iohn Grismand, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part of: Five sermons preached upon sundry especiall occasions: London, 1626.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
